definition: to return (an item)/to send back/to go back
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: We should check evidence (such as despatched records and correspondence) that the goods have been returned.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該審覈貨物是否被退回的證據。

sentences.english: Must maintain the original packaging and accessories complete return intact.
sentences.chinese: 必須保持包裝及原配件完整，原封退回。

sentences.english: I figured the store would give us guff about exchanging it.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得要想把牀退回去恐怕要費一番脣舌。

sentences.english: The e-mail you sent yesterday was returned as undeliverable.
sentences.chinese: 你昨天發的郵件被退回來了。

sentences.english: The gift was returned to its 70-something-year-old sender in the southern port city of Busan the same day.
sentences.chinese: 當日，這份禮物被退回給釜山市年逾七旬的寄件人。

sentences.english: This VCD can be returned for repair under warranty.
sentences.chinese: VCD在保修期間可以退回維修。

sentences.english: Under what circumstances will the payment be refunded?
sentences.chinese: 醫管局在那些特殊情況下會退回預繳的款項？

sentences.english: No problem. You always come back like this.
sentences.chinese: 沒有問題，你可以這麼退回來。

sentences.english: He then returned to the floor with their hands pointed at that, to put it aside.
sentences.chinese: 然後他退回去用手指着地板說，把它放下去。

sentences.english: Note that the different fall-back scenarios are only used in emulated mode.
sentences.chinese: 注意不同的退回場景僅被用於模擬模式。

sentences.english: The tiger retired to its den.
If the gift is not returnable, you've wasted your money.
sentences.chinese: 如果禮物不能退回，那麼錢就浪費了。

sentences.english: Please wind the videtape back a little way; I want to see that bit again.
sentences.chinese: 請將錄像帶退回一點，我想再看看那一部分。

sentences.english: View the Sender field of the returned items.
sentences.chinese: 查看發件人字段的將退回的物料。

sentences.english: He hated to tuck his tail and back down now.
sentences.chinese: 他討厭此時夾着尾巴退回來。

definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to regain/to retake/to take back/to withdraw/to revoke
to turn back/to put back/reversal/melodic inversion (in music)
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
